title: Live updates: New explosions hit Lebanon a day after pager attack
content: Additional explosions linked to electronic devices caused more deaths and injuries a day after pagers used by Hezbollah exploded, wounding thousands.
summary: Additional explosions linked to electronic devices caused more deaths and injuries a day after pagers used by Hezbollah exploded, wounding thousands.

Taiwanese firm Gold Apollo and Hungary deny links to exploded Hezbollah pagers
content: The pagers, deemed by Hezbollah to be safer than cellphones, were probably rigged with explosives before they were delivered to Lebanon, experts said.
summary: The pagers, deemed by Hezbollah to be safer than cellphones, were probably rigged with explosives before they were delivered to Lebanon, experts said.

title: Blinken calls on ‘all parties’ to avoid escalation
Biden’s arms transfers to Israel under internal investigation
content: The Pentagon and State Department inspectors general will soon disclose the findings of investigations scrutinizing U.S. weapons transfers to Israel.

Ukrainian drones hit missile warehouse deep in Russia in massive blast
content: The apparently successful drone attack comes as Ukraine is pushing its Western allies to lift restrictions on the missiles they have supplied for similar attacks inside Russia.
summary: The apparently successful drone attack comes as Ukraine is pushing its Western allies to lift restrictions on the missiles they have supplied for similar attacks inside Russia.

title: Hezbollah explosions put spotlight on old-school pagers
content: Hezbollah turned to low-tech pagers to avoid cellphone tracking by Israeli intelligence. Who else uses pagers, and why?
summary: Hezbollah turned to low-tech pagers to avoid cellphone tracking by Israeli intelligence. Who else uses pagers, and why?

title: Lebanon reels as more devices explode, casualties rise
content: The source of Wednesday’s explosions was not immediately clear but the blasts came a day after thousands of pagers used by Hezbollah blew up across Lebanon.
summary: The source of Wednesday’s explosions was not immediately clear but the blasts came a day after thousands of pagers used by Hezbollah blew up across Lebanon.

title: What we know about the Hezbollah pagers attack
content: The scale of an apparent attack targeting thousands of Hezbollah members across Lebanon at the same time, using their own devices, is unprecedented.
summary: The scale of an apparent attack targeting thousands of Hezbollah members across Lebanon at the same time, using their own devices, is unprecedented.

title: China’s divorce rate soars. Cue the high-powered wedding photo shredder.
content: As China’s divorce rate has skyrocketed, many are left with expensive, and unwanted, wedding photos. Enter the industrial-strength shredding businesses.
summary: As China’s divorce rate has skyrocketed, many are left with expensive, and unwanted, wedding photos. Enter the industrial-strength shredding businesses.

title: Europe grapples with its decline
content: A report on the “future of European competitiveness” has been received as a declaration of continental intent. Whether it can be implemented is another matter.
summary: A report on the “future of European competitiveness” has been received as a declaration of continental intent. Whether it can be implemented is another matter.

title: Venezuela says it arrested fourth U.S. citizen in roundup of foreigners
content: A fourth American citizen was arrested in Venezuela, a top official in the Maduro government said Tuesday, accusing him of plotting “against Venezuela.”
summary: A fourth American citizen was arrested in Venezuela, a top official in the Maduro government said Tuesday, accusing him of plotting “against Venezuela.”

title: Thousands injured in Lebanon as pagers used by Hezbollah explode
content: Pagers used by the militant group Hezbollah simultaneously exploded, injuring more than 2,800 people and killing at least nine, officials said.
summary: Pagers used by the militant group Hezbollah simultaneously exploded, injuring more than 2,800 people and killing at least nine, officials said.

title: Portugal wracked by blazes at tail end of Europe’s wildfire season
content: Three firefighters died battling the blazes, Portugal’s prime minister said, adding the country was going through “difficult days.”
summary: Three firefighters died battling the blazes, Portugal’s prime minister said, adding the country was going through “difficult days.”

title: Israel expands war goals on Lebanon border as U.S. tries to calm tensions
content: White House adviser Amos Hochstein met with top Israeli officials as he tried to de-escalate tensions with the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah.
summary: White House adviser Amos Hochstein met with top Israeli officials as he tried to de-escalate tensions with the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah.

title: Death toll rises in European floods; more severe weather expected
content: At least 19 people have died in floods in central Europe, including in Romania, Poland, Austria and the Czech Republic, according to officials.
summary: At least 19 people have died in floods in central Europe, including in Romania, Poland, Austria and the Czech Republic, according to officials.

title: Meta bans Russian state media outlet RT for acts of ‘foreign interference’
content: The U.S. recently imposed sanctions on RT’s parent companies, Rossiya Segodnya and TV-Novosti, accusing them of acting as an arm of Moscow’s intelligence operations.
summary: The U.S. recently imposed sanctions on RT’s parent companies, Rossiya Segodnya and TV-Novosti, accusing them of acting as an arm of Moscow’s intelligence operations.

title: Man accused of recruiting dozens to rape his wife tells court: ‘I am a rapist’
content: Frenchman Dominique Pélicot testified that he and “everyone else in this room” are rapists, contradicting those who said they didn’t know the woman hadn’t consented.
summary: Frenchman Dominique Pélicot testified that he and “everyone else in this room” are rapists, contradicting those who said they didn’t know the woman hadn’t consented.

title: When Russian bombs fall on Kharkiv, this man collects the evidence
content: This police investigator records the wreckage, measures the shrapnel and gathers the bodies, even without knowing if Russia will ever be held accountable.
summary: This police investigator records the wreckage, measures the shrapnel and gathers the bodies, even without knowing if Russia will ever be held accountable.

title: Suspected gunman’s search for Ukraine fighters was ‘no help,’ former volunteer says
content: The Trump golf course suspect described himself as a defender of Ukraine and Taiwan. But a former representative of Ukraine’s International Legion said he was all talk.
summary: The Trump golf course suspect described himself as a defender of Ukraine and Taiwan. But a former representative of Ukraine’s International Legion said he was all talk.
